titles.title: To amend the Housing Act of 1949 to decrease the number of loans made under section 502 of such Act and increase the regular payments made by borrowers under such loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/6/1993--Introduced. Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to establish annual loan authority limits and minimum payments for specified rural housing loans.
